mapper.insert: insert into board(member_no, title, content) values (#{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.member_no, b.title, b.content, b.registeredDate, b.views, m.name, m.id from board b inner join member m on b.member_no=m.member_no order by b.board_no desc
select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.registeredDate, b.views, b.likeMember, m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.email from board b inner join member m on b.member_no=m.member_no where board_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, where board_no=#{boardNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into board_like(member_no, board_no, registeredDate) values((select member_no from member where id=#{likeId}),#{boardNo},#{registrationDate})
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where member_no=(select member_no from member where id=#{likeId}) and board_no=#{boardNo}
